parameters.description: Log of the intrinsic COTS growth rate (year^-1). Initial value based on literature.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Crown of Thorns starfish population intrinsic growth potential

parameters.description: Log of the attack rate on fast-growing coral (%/m2 per year).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Predation impact on fast-growing coral reef ecosystem

parameters.description: Log of the attack rate on slow-growing coral (%/m2 per year).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Predation impact on slow-growing coral reef community structure

parameters.description: Log of the coral cover threshold (%) triggering outbreak dynamics.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Coral cover tipping point for Crown of Thorns outbreak dynamics

parameters.description: Log of the coral recovery rate (year^-1).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Coral ecosystem resilience and regeneration potential rate

parameters.description: Log of the efficiency of converting predation effects to COTS growth.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Conversion efficiency of coral predation to starfish population growth

parameters.description: Coefficient for the quadratic effect of SST deviation from 26°C on COTS growth. This non-linear term helps capture accelerated population surges under extreme temperatures.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Environmental non-linearity representing quadratic SST effects on COTS growth

parameters.description: Measurement error (standard deviation) for COTS abundance in log space.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Measurement uncertainty in Crown of Thorns population abundance

parameters.description: Measurement error (standard deviation) for fast-growing coral cover in log space.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Measurement variability in fast-growing coral cover estimation

parameters.description: Measurement error (standard deviation) for slow-growing coral cover in log space.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Measurement variability in slow-growing coral cover estimation

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for predation on fast-growing coral (% cover). This parameter defines the coral cover at which the predation effect is half-maximal, capturing resource limitation.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Saturating constant for fast-growing coral in Holling type II predation dynamics

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for predation on slow-growing coral (% cover). This parameter defines the coral cover at which the predation effect is half-maximal, capturing resource limitation.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Saturating constant for slow-growing coral in Holling type II predation dynamics

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for total coral cover modulating predation efficiency. Lower coral cover reduces the efficiency of converting predation effects into COTS growth, reflecting limited prey availability.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Saturating effect of coral availability on COTS predation efficiency

parameters.description: Density-dependent reduction in efficiency converting predation effects to COTS growth, capturing predator interference at high starfish densities.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Modulates effective conversion efficiency based on COTS density

parameters.description: Sensitivity of coral recovery rate to high sea surface temperature (SST). Reduces recovery when SST exceeds 28°C, capturing bleaching and heat stress effects.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Quantifies the reduction in coral recovery rate under thermal stress
